result.title: [HackerRank] 101 Hack Aug'14
result.content:
Hello Coders!

The August edition of 101 Hack is here. 5 interesting challenges in 2 hours. The contest commences on Sat, 30 Aug 2014 13:30:00 UTC, You can sign up for the contest here.

The problem statements will be available in English, Russian and Chinese.
Top 10 on leaderboard get cool HackerRank T Shirts
Books for individual challenge-leaderboard toppers

Problem Setter
Bidhan

Problem Tester
Gerald

Please try all problems, Editorials will be available at the end of contest.

GL&HF

Update It has just started guys!! Brace Yourself!!
